item.title: Using the Slurm REST API to integrate with distributed architectures on AWS
item.description: The Slurm Workload Manager by SchedMD is a popular HPC scheduler and is supported by AWS ParallelCluster, an elastic HPC cluster management service offered by AWS. Traditional HPC workflows involve logging into a head node and running shell commands to submit jobs to a scheduler and check job status. Modern distributed systems often use representational [â€¦] Read the full post at the AWS HPC Blog.
